plays.text: Penalty to Claude Lapointe 2 minutes for Charging Johan Hedberg

Goal scored by Jeremy Roenick assisted by Tony Amonte and Keith Primeau
Penalty to Dan Focht 2 minutes for Hooking John LeClair
Goal scored by Jeremy Roenick assisted by Keith Primeau and Tony Amonte
Goal scored by Marty Murray assisted by Tony Amonte and Jeremy Roenick
Penalty to Sami Kapanen 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Martin Straka
